But the limits of such individuality as this cannot be strictly

plan of structure is the same <sup>x</sup><u>Note</u> [<sup>x</sup> See also M Huxley's
observations on this subject, in Philos. Transactions 1857
pp. 578. 580] Hence in regard to the Foraminifera, and in regard
